[h1]10/10 would recommend[/h1]
In CS:GO you are able to experience such a [b]wholesome and heartwarming community[/b].
It's a place where no toxicness, bad manners or verbal abuses exists. 
Every day when I start the game, I'm really excited to get another wholesome and heartwarming voice chat with my teammates.

Last but not least I'd thank all players out there to keep the community clean and friendly.
